mapper.select: /* getBoardList :: 게시글 리스트 조회 */ SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD , SUBSTR(TITLE, 1, 25) AS TITLE_25 , SUBSTR(CONTENTS, 1, 60) AS CONTENTS_60 FROM bboom_board
/* getScrapList :: 스크랩 리스트 조회 */ SELECT * , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD , SUBSTR(TITLE, 1, 40) AS TITLE_20 FROM bboom_board
/* getCommentList :: 댓글 리스트 조회 */ SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD ,SUBSTR(TITLE, 10) FROM board_comment
